result.title: Report on geometrical variants of glazing and fluid composition concepts for the FFG facade
result.description: Based on the existing FFG elements different variants of size and thickness of glazing elements are analyzed by simulation. Also, different fluids (fluid properties, temperature range, solar absorption properties) are implemented in order to improve mass and energy transport.
